level.text: The Department shall have a non-exclusive license, free of charge, to use any data or information system, including software, documentation and manuals, developed by the managed care provider pursuant to the implementation of the provider’s Medicaid managed care provider agreement. The use of any data or information system by the Department under the nonexclusive license shall be for the Department’s use only and not for the use of others.

Data, information, and reports collected or prepared by the managed care provider in the course of carrying out its obligations under the Medicaid managed care provider agreement shall not be used by the managed care provider for any purpose not directly related to meeting the terms of the Medicaid managed care provider agreement without the prior written permission of the Department.

The Department may reproduce, publish and otherwise use and authorize others to use, for District, state or federal government purposes, any material developed by the managed care provider in the course of the performance of the Medicaid managed care provider agreement.
